title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 19 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 19 June 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Thursday, June 19 broadcast of The Alex Jones Show, Jones breaks down the out-of-control censorship of independent media outlets, such asby various governmental organizations, illustrating how the establishment fears real news working to expose corruption. 

Jones also examines the latest chapter in IRS-gate, where the hard drives containing former IRS official Lois Lerner's emails have been wiped, potentially destroying evidence which may have proved her complicity in targeting Tea Party groups for extra scrutiny. 

On today's edition, Alex welcomes author and 24-year State Department veteran Peter Van Buren to discuss the ISIS terror group wreaking havoc in Iraq, and ways America's middle class is being dismantled. 

Alex will also continue looking at the government and taxpayer-funded invasion of our nation's borders, and Congress's flagging approval ratings in the face of over-the-top government overreach.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
